author: larryi
msg: Add a uri_select parameter to the configuration settings that controls
the URL forwarded to Tomcat.  It accepts valid values of parsed,
unparsed, and escaped.  These values forward to Tomcat the
normalized/decoded URL, the original URL, or a normalized/decoded
re-encoded URL, respectively. This makes it possible for this isapi plugin
to work correctly with Tomcat 3.2.x, which expects an encoded URL.
The re-encode routine was borrowed from Apache 1.3 source.

author: larryi
msg: Patches for Tomcat 3.3a to avoid DOS vulnerability, display "not found"
for the vulnerable request, and update the version to 3.3a.

author: larryi
msg: Add original Tomcat 3.3 sources that need patching for Tomcat 3.3a.

author: billbarker
msg: Restoring StreamHandler functionality as a module.

This does basically the same thing that was previously hard-coded into the Tomcat API.  The only difference is that it is now optional.  SOAP users et. al. only need to install the StreamHandler.war file in the modules directory to get the new behavior.
